Text: Effective Date: January 1, 2023
Label: Updated Privacy Policy

Text:
INFORMATION COLLECTION.

We receive the following categories of information about consumer from third party providers:

                (a)          Personal Information. This is information which can identify a consumer and includes consumer name and email address, postal address and on occasion consumer telephone or mobile number.

                (b)          Demographic Information. This information includes consumer zip code, postal address, and consumer mobile number.

                (c)           Our Website Tracking. We may track and record consumer movement through our Website when consumer or client visits on our website, what services or products consumer access or order, and this may include information about consumer or client’s computer hardware and software, including IP address, general geographic location of the computer or device, browser preference, general operating systems of the device or computer used. When we can identify the client or consumer personally, through this information, it is Personal Information.

                (d)          Third-Party Information. Except for website tracking information, all information we receive about a consumer is provided by a third-party which may include personal, demographic, and technology information.  We do not receive information found in cookies or persistent identifiers
Label: Categories of Personal Information Collected

Text: TECHNOLOGY INFORMATION COLLECTION.\n\n                (a)          Generally. We use tracking technologies similar to web beacons on our Website only. We do not use or  receive any information about consumers unless contact by a consumer and then we record all consumer information provided to us by that consumer. Using these technologies, we collect client and consumer IP addresses, browser type, ISP, referring/exit pages, operating system, date/time stamp, and/or clickstream data when they are on our Website. We use this to analyze, monitor and update our Website, ease of movements through our Website or to determine any security issues presented on our Website. We may create reports or logs based on these technologies.
Label: Categories of Personal Information Collected

Text: USE OF INFORMATION.\n\n                (a)          We use the consumer information provided by our client to license and manage such information with third parties to provide the consumer with commercial advertising in third party  services and/or products.
Label: Categories of Personal Information Collected

Text: USE OF INFORMATION.\n\n                (a)          We use the consumer information provided by our client to license and manage such information with third parties to provide the consumer with commercial advertising in third party  services and/or products
Label: Categories of Personal Information Shared / Disclosed

Text: USE OF INFORMATION.\n\n                (a)          We use the consumer information provided by our client to license and manage such information with third parties to provide the consumer with commercial advertising in third party  services and/or products
Label: Categories of Personal Information Sold

Text:
We use the information provided on our through our Website to respond to any questions consumer have, operate, and improve the functionality of our Website. We may use the information for testing, research, analysis and marketing development. This includes maintaining and improving the safety, security and integrity of our Website, databases, and technology assets.

                (c)           We use the information provided to us to assist third parties to promote their and third-party campaigns, products, and services to consumer that might be of interest to consumer.

                (d)          We also use the information to respond to consumer questions concerns or requests.

                (e)          Third-parties will use the information when we share, or lease, it to provide consumer with their services and products.
Label: Categories of Personal Information Collected

Text: Third-parties will use the information when we share, or lease, it to provide consumer with their services and products.
Label: Categories of Personal Information Shared / Disclosed

Text: \n                (e)
Label: Categories of Personal Information Sold

Text: SHARING AND SALE OF INFORMATION.\n\n                (a)          Generally. All information, including the personal information (including consumer name and email), may be leased, licensed, shared, disclosed, or sold to third-parties for their marketing campaigns.
Label: Categories of Personal Information Shared / Disclosed

Text:
Website Functionality. We share all categories of information set out in this policy with third-party Service Providers we employ to perform technical or analytical functions on our behalf. Examples include third-parties who host our Website, analyze our data, and provide customer service.

                (c)           Third-Party Products and Services. We share all categories of information set out in this Privacy Policy with third-parties including unaffiliated entities, service providers, and data aggregators who will provide consumer with their marketing opportunities, products, or services.

                (d)          Anonymized information. We share aggregated anonymous information about consumers, combined with Service Providers and other third-party vendors and clients for their analysis, promotion, and marketing. This includes demographic information.

                (e)          Legal Process. We disclose consumer information, if legally required to do so, or at our discretion, pursuant to a request from a governmental entity, or if we believe in good faith that such action is necessary to: (a) conform to legal requirements or comply with legal process; (b) protect our rights or property, or our affiliated companies; (c) prevent a crime or protect national security; or (d) protect the personal safety of users or the public.

                (f)           Acquisition or Merger. We may disclose, share, sell and transfer consumer information to a third-party who acquires any or all of our business, whether such acquisition is by way of merger, consolidation or purchase of all or a substantial portion of our assets. In the event we become the subject of an insolvency proceeding, whether voluntary or involuntary, we or our liquidator, administrator, receiver, or administrative receiver may sell, license, or otherwise dispose of, such information in a transaction approved by the court.
Label: Categories of Personal Information Shared / Disclosed

Examples include third-parties who host our Website, analyze our data, and provide customer service.\n\n                (c)           Third-Party Products and Services. We share all categories of information set out in this Privacy Policy with third-parties including unaffiliated entities, service providers, and data aggregators who will provide consumer with their marketing opportunities, products, or services.
Label: Categories of Personal Information Sold

Text: Acquisition or Merger. We may disclose, share, sell and transfer consumer information to a third-party who acquires any or all of our business, whether such acquisition is by way of merger, consolidation or purchase of all or a substantial portion of our assets. In the event we become the subject of an insolvency proceeding, whether voluntary or involuntary, we or our liquidator, administrator, receiver, or administrative receiver may sell, license, or otherwise dispose of, such information in a transaction approved by the court.

Text: Deletion Request Rights.\n\nYou have the right to request that we delete any of your personal information in our database. We may deny your deletion request if retaining the information is necessary for us or our service provider(s) to: (1) Detect security incidents, protect against malicious, deceptive, fraudulent, or illegal activity, or prosecute those responsible for such activities. (2) Debug our systems or identify and repair errors that impair existing intended functionality; (3) Comply with a legal obligation.

Label: Updated Privacy Policy

Text:
INFORMATION COLLECTION.

We receive the following categories of information about consumer from third party providers:

                (a)          Personal Information. This is information which can identify a consumer and includes consumer name and email address, postal address and on occasion consumer telephone or mobile number.

                (b)          Demographic Information. This information includes consumer zip code, postal address, and consumer mobile number.

                (c)           Our Website Tracking. We may track and record consumer movement through our Website when consumer or client visits on our website, what services or products consumer access or order, and this may include information about consumer or client’s computer hardware and software, including IP address, general geographic location of the computer or device, browser preference, general operating systems of the device or computer used. When we can identify the client or consumer personally, through this information, it is Personal Information.

                (d)          Third-Party Information. Except for website tracking information, all information we receive about a consumer is provided by a third-party which may include personal, demographic, and technology information.  We do not receive information found in cookies or persistent identifiers.  We do not have access or control over third party websites, cookies or tracking devices as they are owned and operated by unaffiliated parties. We have no responsibility or liability for the policies and practices of these parties.
Label: Categories of Personal Information Collected

Text: TECHNOLOGY INFORMATION COLLECTION.\n\n                (a)          Generally. We use tracking technologies similar to web beacons on our Website only. We do not use or  receive any information about consumers unless contact by a consumer and then we record all consumer information provided to us by that consumer. Using these technologies, we collect client and consumer IP addresses, browser type, ISP, referring/exit pages, operating system, date/time stamp, and/or clickstream data when they are on our Website. We use this to analyze, monitor and update our Website, ease of movements through our Website or to determine any security issues presented on our Website. We may create reports or logs based on these technologies. California residents should be advised we do not respond to do not track signals or cookies.
Label: Categories of Personal Information Collected

Text:
USE OF INFORMATION.

                (a)          We use the consumer information provided by our client to license and manage such information with third parties to provide the consumer with commercial advertising in third party  services and/or products.  Those third parties who license the data from us have their own policies and terms which may differ significantly from ours and we recommend that before interacting with any party consumers review the terms and privacy policies posted for those parties. We do not control the privacy practices of third-parties. Please contact the third-party with any questions about their privacy practices.

                (b)          We use the information provided on our through our Website to respond to any questions consumer have, operate, and improve the functionality of our Website. We may use the information for testing, research, analysis and marketing development. This includes maintaining and improving the safety, security and integrity of our Website, databases, and technology assets.

                (c)           We use the information provided to us to assist third parties to promote their and third-party campaigns, products, and services to consumer that might be of interest to consumer.

                (d)          We also use the information to respond to consumer questions concerns or requests.

                (e)          Third-parties will use the information when we share, or lease, it to provide consumer with their services and products.
Label: Categories of Personal Information Collected

Text:
USE OF INFORMATION.

                (a)          We use the consumer information provided by our client to license and manage such information with third parties to provide the consumer with commercial advertising in third party  services and/or products.  Those third parties who license the data from us have their own policies and terms which may differ significantly from ours and we recommend that before interacting with any party consumers review the terms and privacy policies posted for those parties. We do not control the privacy practices of third-parties. Please contact the third-party with any questions about their privacy practices.

                (b)          We use the information provided on our through our Website to respond to any questions consumer have, operate, and improve the functionality of our Website. We may use the information for testing, research, analysis and marketing development. This includes maintaining and improving the safety, security and integrity of our Website, databases, and technology assets.

                (c)           We use the information provided to us to assist third parties to promote their and third-party campaigns, products, and services to consumer that might be of interest to consumer.

                (d)          We also use the information to respond to consumer questions concerns or requests.

                (e)          Third-parties will use the information when we share, or lease, it to provide consumer with their services and products.
Label: Categories of Personal Information Shared / Disclosed

Text: SHARING AND SALE OF INFORMATION.\n\n                (a)          Generally. All information, including the personal information (including consumer name and email), may be leased, licensed, shared, disclosed, or sold to third-parties for their marketing campaigns. This may result in unsolicited email messages to consumer about those third-party products and services.
Label: Categories of Personal Information Shared / Disclosed

Text: SHARING AND SALE OF INFORMATION.\n\n                (a)          Generally. This may result in unsolicited email messages to consumer about those third-party products and services.
Label: Categories of Personal Information Sold

Text: Website Functionality. We share all categories of information set out in this policy with third-party Service Providers we employ to perform technical or analytical functions on our behalf. Examples include third-parties who host our Website, analyze our data, and provide customer service.
Label: Categories of Personal Information Shared / Disclosed

Text: Third-Party Products and Services. We share all categories of information set out in this Privacy Policy with third-parties including unaffiliated entities, service providers, and data aggregators who will provide consumer with their marketing opportunities, products, or services.
Label: Categories of Personal Information Shared / Disclosed

Text:
Anonymized information. We share aggregated anonymous information about consumers, combined with Service Providers and other third-party vendors and clients for their analysis, promotion, and marketing. This includes demographic information.

                (e)          Legal Process. We disclose consumer information, if legally required to do so, or at our discretion, pursuant to a request from a governmental entity, or if we believe in good faith that such action is necessary to: (a) conform to legal requirements or comply with legal process; (b) protect our rights or property, or our affiliated companies; (c) prevent a crime or protect national security; or (d) protect the personal safety of users or the public.

                (f)           Acquisition or Merger. We may disclose, share, sell and transfer consumer information to a third-party who acquires any or all of our business, whether such acquisition is by way of merger, consolidation or purchase of all or a substantial portion of our assets. In the event we become the subject of an insolvency proceeding, whether voluntary or involuntary, we or our liquidator, administrator, receiver, or administrative receiver may sell, license, or otherwise dispose of, such information in a transaction approved by the court.
Label: Categories of Personal Information Shared / Disclosed

Text: Acquisition or Merger. We may disclose, share, sell and transfer consumer information to a third-party who acquires any or all of our business, whether such acquisition is by way of merger, consolidation or purchase of all or a substantial portion of our assets. In the event we become the subject of an insolvency proceeding, whether voluntary or involuntary, we or our liquidator, administrator, receiver, or administrative receiver may sell, license, or otherwise dispose of, such information in a transaction approved by the court.
Label: Categories of Personal Information Sold

Text: CHANGE TO THIS PRIVACY POLICY.\n\n                We have the right to make material changes to this Privacy Policy. We will post those changes through a prominent notice on the website with no further notice to consumers. Please review this policy often so that consumers will always know what information we gather, how we might use that information, and with whom we disclose, share, and sell it.
Label: Updated Privacy Policy

Text: Effective Date: January 1, 2023
Label: Updated Privacy Policy

Text: Access to and Correction of Specific Information and Data Portability Rights.\n\nYou have the right to request that we disclose and or correct certain information to you about our collection and use of your personal information over the past 12 months.
Label: Description of Right to Correct Information

Text: Access to and Correction of Specific Information and Data Portability Rights.\n\nYou have the right to request that we disclose and or correct certain information to you about our collection and use of your personal information over the past 12 months.
Label: Description of Right to Know PI Collected

Text: Access to and Correction of Specific Information and Data Portability Rights.\n\nYou have the right to request that we disclose and or correct certain information to you about our collection and use of your personal information over the past 12 months.
Label: Description of Right to Know PI sold / shared

Text: Deletion Request Rights.\n\nYou have the right to request that we delete any of your personal information in our database. We may deny your deletion request if retaining the information is necessary for us or our service provider(s) to: (1) Detect security incidents, protect against malicious, deceptive, fraudulent, or illegal activity, or prosecute those responsible for such activities. (2) Debug our systems or identify and repair errors that impair existing intended functionality; (3) Comply with a legal obligation.
Label: Description of Right to Delete

Text: Right to Opt-Out of the Sale of Personal Information.\n\nYou have the right to opt-out of any sale of your Personal Information by us.
Label: Description of Right to Opt-out of sale of PI

Text: Opt-Out Preference Signal (Global Privacy Control).\n\nYou may use an Opt-Out Preference Signal, such as the Global Privacy Control (“GPC”), to opt-out of the sale/sharing of your personal information.
Label: Methods to exercise rights

Text:
Exercising Access, Data Portability, and Deletion Rights.

To exercise the access, data portability, and deletion rights described above, please submit a verifiable consumer request to us by either:

Write Us at: malvernexecutive1@gmail.com or Malvern Media Inc., Attn: Privacy & Compliance Department, 2129 Redcliff St., Los Angeles, CA 90039
Label: Methods to exercise rights

Text: You will be required to provide your full name, email address, and zip code.
Label: Categories of Personal Information Collected

Text: We will only use personal information provided in a verifiable consumer request to verify the requestor's identity or authority to make the request.
Label: Categories of Personal Information Collected

Text: Non-Discrimination.\n\nWe will not discriminate against you for exercising any of your CCPA rights.
Label: Description of Right to Non-discrimination on exercising rights

Text: Changes to Our Privacy Notice.\n\nWe reserve the right to amend this privacy notice at our discretion and at any time. The only notice to you will be our posting of the updated notice on the Website and update the notice's effective date.
Label: Updated Privacy Policy

Text: Contact Information.\n\nIf you have any questions or comments about this notice, the ways in which we collect and use your information described here and in the posted Privacy Policy, your choices, and rights regarding such use, or wish to exercise your rights under California law, please do not hesitate to contact us at: malvernexecutive@gmail.com or Malvern Media Inc. Attn: Privacy & Compliance Department 2129 Redcliff St. Los Angeles, CA 90039.
Label: Methods to exercise rights
